title: ‘I’m No Longer the Fastest Belgian’: Wout van Aert Humbled After Sprint Misfire Just Weeks Ahead of Classics
content:
Race jury turns blind eye to Feltrin's maneuver and his win stands against Van Aert and all-star Belgian field: 'Look at the top-10 that I beat.'

Read the full article at ‘I’m No Longer the Fastest Belgian’: Wout van Aert Humbled After Sprint Misfire Just Weeks Ahead of Classics on Velo.
author: ahood
